baseline_groups.claim_summary: Entrepreneurs ranked higher by peers earn larger returns from cash grants (Winner*Rank interaction on profits).
baseline_groups.notes: Coef=465.8 (p=0.002). Panel OLS with survey round FE, clustered at group level.

global_notes: Paper tests whether peer rankings predict marginal returns to capital in an Indian microenterprise RCT. 51 specs total. Simulated outcome data. Main result robust across controls, rounds, and outcome measures. Placebo (baseline) correctly shows null. Functional form (squared) shows reversal.
